title: WTB: 1877 St Paul Red Caps vs Indianapolis Blues Baseball Scorecard that sold in 2011
author: Tay1038

posts.post_title: WTB: 1877 St Paul Red Caps vs Indianapolis Blues Baseball Scorecard that sold in 2011
posts.post_content:
Good afternoon,

I am searching for this particular scorecard that sold back in 2011 through Huggins & Scott. The scorecard is from 1877 and was between the St. Paul Red Caps and Indianapolis Blues. 

[url]http://jan11.hugginsandscott.com/cgi-bin/showitem.pl?itemid=29179[/url]

I will pay an absurd premium for it. 

Thank you,

Taylor Simons
Bump - Still looking to add this program.
Seems like a needle in a haystack kind of thing to find that specific item.  Did you contact the auctionhouse and ask who won it?  That might be your best shot.
I did. No luck.  Worth a shot
Still in search for this program. I am paying $1000.
